cause.description:
In a post 9-11 world, the powers that be are again contorting information to create a terror state that subjects us to a constant mind frame of fear in order to maintain the power of the military industrial complex thereby subverting democracy and civil rights at home and around the world. A far cry from America's run-of-the-mill "left", we as socialists do not simply stand against a capitalist system of greed, hatred, and elitism, but we support and stand in solidarity with the international proletariat in our fight against corporate power and neo-liberalism. Learning from the lessons of history, we look forward to an age of a new nation based upon community, compulsory services, justice and equality.
1. A basic tenate in modern life is the production and distrubution of commodities. The equal distribution of said commodities is the only way to ensure a society void of ignorance, oppresion, violence, and injustice.
2. Demoracy cannot exist in a two party system where most of the voting occurs every four years where a fraction of the public chooses between two white, rich, protestant males who, when put into office, will inevitably sustain the machine of militarism and
3. Until we understand the nature of institutional violence and how it manipulates values and mores to maintain the power of the few, we will forever be imprisioned in the caves of ignorance.
cause.mission: To reinstate and reinvigorate socialist thought in America.
